title: Problems Bugsplat &  Ingame connection issues
body:
Problems

1. * Bugsplat every time i open up league i can press the "Launch button" and then there pops up a Bugsplat on top of my login screen 
         i don´t know why i happens but maybe it haves a connection between my next problem or its because i don´t have Alpha client or what its called

2.      Connection Problems sometimes i my game fails to respond and there pops up "Trying to reconnect" and i don´t think its on my hand because my                 others games i have no problems at all 

I hope we can get this fixed because. i´m on the edge of quitting league because every time that happens i usually die for no reason.

Bye that´s my problems. i hope we can get them fixed

replies.body:
It's possible that both of your issues are influenced by a *poor connection* to our servers. Bugsplats are rarely caused by this, however, because your bugsplat occurs right when a transition to our login series is supposed to happen, this may be the case. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to ensure that you aren't running a problematic network configuration that could cause issues reaching our servers.

Let me know if this helped.
